LanguageData.VFEM2_MeleeWeapon_HeavyMace.label: heavy mace
LanguageData.VFEM2_MeleeWeapon_HeavyMace.description: A heavy mace consisting of a shaft and a heavy ball adorned with spikes. Very effective at piercing plate armor, this weapon is often used by more vicious knights and mercenaries.
LanguageData.VFEM2_MeleeWeapon_DaneAxe.label: скандинавский топор
LanguageData.VFEM2_MeleeWeapon_DaneAxe.description: A mighty weapon on the battlefield in the right kind of hands. Made to cut through flesh and bones alike. The axe edge extends into what's called horns, ideal for cutting through light armor and flesh alike.\n\nThis weapon has a chance to deal a critical strike, stunning the opponent.
LanguageData.VFEM2_MeleeWeapon_DaneAxe.tools.0.label: животновод
LanguageData.VFEM2_MeleeWeapon_DaneAxe.tools.1.label: лезвие
LanguageData.VFEM2_MeleeWeapon_Claymore.label: claymore
LanguageData.VFEM2_MeleeWeapon_Claymore.description: A brutal, ancient weapon of heavy knights, the claymore can be used cleave through enemies with ease, occasionally dealing critical damage and stunning the victim.
LanguageData.VFEM2_MeleeWeapon_Claymore.tools.0.label: животновод
LanguageData.VFEM2_MeleeWeapon_Claymore.tools.1.label: остриё
LanguageData.VFEM2_MeleeWeapon_Claymore.tools.2.label: лезвие
LanguageData.VFEM2_MeleeWeapon_Halberd.label: halberd
LanguageData.VFEM2_MeleeWeapon_Halberd.description: A long, unwieldy polearm tipped with a sharp point for stabbing opponents. The reach of the pike allows to strike enemies much further away.
LanguageData.VFEM2_MeleeWeapon_Halberd.tools.0.label: древко
LanguageData.VFEM2_MeleeWeapon_Halberd.tools.1.label: древко
LanguageData.VFEM2_MeleeWeapon_Halberd.tools.2.label: остриё
LanguageData.VFEM2_MeleeWeapon_Halberd.tools.3.label: лезвие
LanguageData.VFEM2_MeleeWeapon_Standard.label: standard
LanguageData.VFEM2_MeleeWeapon_Standard.description: A long wooden pole adorned with a flag bearing the heraldry of its bearer. While it inspires unity and bolsters morale as a rallying point for soldiers, the standard itself is poorly suited for combat, offering little in terms of offense or defense.
LanguageData.VFEM2_MeleeWeapon_Standard.tools.0.label: древко
LanguageData.VFEM2_MeleeWeapon_Standard.tools.1.label: древко
LanguageData.VFEM2_MeleeWeapon_Pike.label: pike
LanguageData.VFEM2_MeleeWeapon_Pike.description: A long, unwieldy polearm tipped with a sharp point for stabbing opponents. The reach of the pike allows to strike enemies much further away.
LanguageData.VFEM2_MeleeWeapon_Pike.tools.0.label: древко
LanguageData.VFEM2_MeleeWeapon_Pike.tools.1.label: древко
LanguageData.VFEM2_MeleeWeapon_Pike.tools.2.label: остриё
LanguageData.VFEM2_MeleeWeapon_Shortsword.label: shortsword
LanguageData.VFEM2_MeleeWeapon_Shortsword.description: A versatile and compact blade designed for both thrusting and slashing. Its nimble design makes it effective in close-quarters combat, where quick strikes can overwhelm slower foes.
LanguageData.VFEM2_MeleeWeapon_Flail.label: flail
LanguageData.VFEM2_MeleeWeapon_Flail.description: A refined mace, with a spiked head connected to the handle with a chain, engineered for efficient swinging and deadly impacts. The randomness of the chain movement means that damage may fluctuate greatly.
LanguageData.VFEM2_MeleeWeapon_Flail.tools.0.label: животновод
LanguageData.VFEM2_MeleeWeapon_Flail.tools.1.label: голова
